item.title: Contraceptive Deserts Cartography
item.description: Here’s another look at the data I used for my post on spatial Bayesian models! I made this value-by-alpha, or bivariate choropleth, map for my final map design project in Intro to Geographic Information Systems. I followed the work (and color schemes!) of Joshua Stevens. His tutorial uses QGIS but the same methods can be implemented easily in ArcMap.
